One of the drawbacks to running a weekly music thread is that, six times out of seven, we’re behind the times.
This week, our adventures abroad continue.
As our faithful readers will shortly discover, nearly the entirety of this week’s WMT is devoted to a new group out of Bristol called Black Country, New Road
We write to you, as we’ve implied to this point, estranged and expatriated. And it is strange and…patriate?
